newsArray.description: Green Bay blew a three-score lead against its division rivals in Chicago to end another season that fell short.

newsArray.title: Biggest FA Cup Upset Ever? The Case for Macclesfield vs Crystal Palace
newsArray.description: The FA Cup has long been celebrated for its romance, unpredictability, and giant-killing moments, but Macclesfield’s stunning victory over Crystal Palace has reignited debate about what truly qualifies as the competition’s greatest upset. With a lower-league side overcoming a Premier League opponent, fans across the UK are asking whether this result deserves to be etched [...]
creator: beaveronline

newsArray.title: Man United midfielder targeted by Euro giants as Red Devils consider midfield shake-up
newsArray.description: Ajax are exploring the possibility of signing Manuel Ugarte this month as they look to reinforce their defensive midfield options, according to a report from Mike Verweij via Soccer News. The Dutch giants, currently in the midst of a rebuilding phase, believe Ugarte could offer the strength and energy they have been lacking in the [...]The post Man United midfielder targeted by Euro giants as Red Devils consider midfield shake-up appeared first on CaughtOffside.
creator: ahad shaukat

newsArray.title: FIFA U17 Women’s World Cup Qualifiers: Teen Cranes to face Zimbabwe
newsArray.description: Uganda U17 Women’s National Football Team, the Teen Cranes have pitted against Zimbabwe in the qualifiers for this year’s World Cup. In the draw conducted on Saturday in Rabat, Morocco, Uganda will face Zimbabwe at the first round in April. The Teen Cranes will visit Zimbabwe between 10th -12th before facing off a week later [...]The post FIFA U17 Women’s World Cup Qualifiers: Teen Cranes to face Zimbabwe appeared first on Kawowo Sports.
creator: joel muyita
